description: Defines the Polymer.IronValidatableBehavior, a behavior for validating user input in Polymer elements, including properties, methods, and validation logic.

classes.name: Polymer.IronValidatableBehavior
classes.description: A Polymer behavior for adding validation capabilities to custom elements, managing validation state, and integrating with validators.

methods.name: _invalidChanged
methods.description: Updates the 'aria-invalid' attribute based on the 'invalid' property.

methods.name: hasValidator
methods.description: Checks if a validator is set and available.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates the given value, updates 'invalid' state, and returns validation result.

methods.name: _getValidity
methods.description: Returns the validity of a value, using the validator if available; meant to be overridden for custom validation logic.
